attributes.action: take the war to criminals by permitting law-abiding citizens to carry concealed handguns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 33 States in the US, the relegalisation of handguns has caused crime rates to fall substantially. In the UK, it should be criminals rather than citizens who walk in fear. I call upon the Prime Minister to relegalise ownership and carrying of handguns, after passing a training qualification, by any adult with no history of violence or mental instability.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " take the war to criminals by permitting law-abiding citizens to carry concealed handguns."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14130.asp
